test.name: UnconditionalForwarding.TC.013
test.description: Validate the subscriber is able to configure a list of phone numbers that only messages from them should be forwarded / Validate Forwarding doesn't work if sender number is not in this list Test Category: MUST Test Steps: --------------------------------------------------------------- 1. Define forward address through Web Portal. 2. Subscriber configure a list of phone numbers so that only messages from those numbers should be forwarded. 3. The sender is not present in the list configured. Send MM7 Message to MMS Proxy 4. MMS Proxy should intercept this message and send "New-Message-Intercepted" Request to Application as HTTP GET Request. 5. MMS Extra after validating the user and recipient sends a positive response and asks for "send data" to MMS Proxy server. 6. MMS Proxy then sends HTTP post with having body of 200 Kbyte data 7. Sender credit balance has been checked, if the sender has balance to send request. 8. Application gets forward address for that subscriber through its database. 9. Advanced proxy does not changes the recipient headers ---------------------------------------------------------------
